body.name: Dove Body Love Pampering Body Lotion Shea Butter Pack of 3 for Silky, Smooth Skin Softens & Smoothes Dry Skin 13.5oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: PAMPERING CARE FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: Give your body the love and care it deserves with Dove Pampering Care Shea Butter body lotion for softer, smoother, healthier skin with every application
INDULGE YOUR SENSES: Dove Shea Butter body lotion delights the senses with the scent of shea butter and warm vanilla
RETAINS 9X MORE MOISTURE THAN UNTREATED SKIN: Beautifully nourishes dry skin and provides daily, 24-hour moisturization
INFUSED WITH RESTORING CERAMIDE SERUM: A unique blend of ingredients in Dove Pampering Care body lotion designed to replenish ceramides with nutrients that strengthen the skin's moisture barrier
DERMATOLOGIST-APPROVED: This fast-absorbing, non-greasy, and paraben-free lotion provides long-lasting care for all skin types
SKIN CARE THAT GOES FURTHER: 100% Recycled bottles. PETA Cruelty-Free. Globally, Dove does not test on animals
body.description: Dove believes in Body Love. That means caring for your body and showing it some love, no matter how you're feeling about it. With the new Dove Body Love collection, our hand and body lotions combine care for your skin with self-care for you. With a fast-absorbing and non-greasy formula, Dove Body Love Pampering Care body lotion provides long-lasting care for soft, smooth, and radiant skin. This body lotion is infused with restoring ceramide serum to replenish ceramides with nutrients that strengthen the skin's moisture barrier. Indulge your senses with the delicate scent of creamy shea butter and warm vanilla, bringing you comfort while nourishing your skin. This fast-absorbing, non-greasy lotion for dry skin is also dermatologist-approved, making it suitable for all skin types, and perfect for everyone, every day. So show your body some love with this rich and creamy formula. Compared to untreated skin, your skin will retain 9x more moisture with up to 24 hours of moisturization. For an indulgent treat, simply massage this Dove lotion for dry skin, paying special attention to areas of dry skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 'Our bodies tolerate a lot, from body pressures to body criticism, which is why we want to give them the love and care they deserve. Dove Body Love Glowing Body Lotion, infused with our Restoring Ceramide Serum and Shea Butter, replenishes skin with moisture for silky soft, glowing skin.

PAMPER YOUR SENSES Embrace the rich scent of shea butter and warm vanilla. LONG-LASTING BODY-LOVING MOISTURIZATION This body lotion provides dry skin with 24 hours of moisturization daily for softer, smoother skin. DERMATOLOGIST-APPROVED MOISTURIZER This paraben-free body lotion absorbs quickly and instantly refreshes skin with a light, non-greasy feel. TRANSFORM YOUR SKIN CARE ROUTINE INTO A SMALL ACT OF SELF-CARE Use this body lotion after a shower or bath with Dove Body Wash for softer and smoother skin.

Dove Body Love Sensitive Care Body Lotion, 13.5 oz Dove Body Love Ultra Restorative Body Lotion, 13.5 oz Dove Body Love Deep Nourishment Body Lotion, 13.5 oz Main Benefit This sensitive care body lotion soothes dry and sensitive skin. This moisturizing body lotion visibly improves recurring dry skin. This nourishing body lotion provides 48-hour moisturization for skin that's soft, smooth, and as resilient as you are.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars DOVE BODY LOTION WITH SHEA BUTTER
reviews.reviewText: Well ... overall ... it's a good lotion. Expensive, but good. To be fair, it's a little greasy ... I feel like it leaves a slight -film- on my skin, that I can feel. I guess one way of describing that would be to say that it doesn't feel like my skin absorbs it. It's also highly perfumed. In summary, I suppose it depends on what one is looking for in a lotion. I used a Mary Kay brand that is similar to this brand, and I liked it. Because I don't have access to Mary Kay any longer is the reason I went with this Dove brand. I also like the scent and perfume of the lotion ... but if strong perfume smells bother you, then you may not like this product. The only thing that I'll say made me feel -uncomfortable- is the filmy feeling it leaves - like my skin doesn't absorb it - even after I have thoroughly rubbed it in - I mentioned this earlier. However, the lotion does make my skin feel soft and smooth. Again, it depends on what one is looking for - if one is looking for a lotion that has a high perfume smell, goes on lightly - makes the skin feel soft, smooth, and gives it a kind of glow - and one doesn't mind the filmy feel - then this is a good product. If those things bother one ... then one may probably want to pass this product up.
